attributes.action: Change the Law so that everyone must live in the UK for 18 years before they are eligible to claim State Benefit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A person born in the UK has to be 18 years old before they can claim Job seekers allowance or income support, hense they have to live in the UK for 18 years before they can claim either benefit.  This Law should be applied to everyone who puts in a claim for either of these benefits.
